::DrillBit::

KitKat was out of the battle. He was glad she was safe.

The flare hit.
"What in blazes..." he started, but then relized what it was.
"Computer, realign optic sensors to compinsate," he said to his on board
computer.
"Afirmative," the comp responded.
His optics tented enough to block most of the effect.
"Action completed," the comp chimed.
"Ha! Now the Alliance are as blind as a bat!"
